name: Fountains of Wayne
description:
'''Fountains of Wayne''' is an American [[Rock music|rock]] band that formed in [[New York City]] in 1995. The band's lineup for the majority of its career was founding members [[Chris Collingwood]] and [[Adam Schlesinger]], with [[Jody Porter]] and [[Brian Young (drummer)|Brian Young]] who joined after the band's first album. The band, best known for the [[Grammy]]-nominated song "[[Stacy's Mom]]," released six albums from 1996 to 2011 before effectively disbanding in 2013.

Schlesinger died of complications from [[Coronavirus disease 2019|COVID-19]] on April 1, 2020. The surviving members of Fountains of Wayne reunited in April 2020 for an online one-shot concert as a tribute to Schlesinger, and reunited again for shows in 2025.
